dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 3696 IH: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Lynchburg, Virginia, as the “Private First Class Desmond T. Doss VA Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Good of Virginia (for himself, Mr. Wittman, Mrs. Kiggans of Virginia, Mr. Scott of Virginia, Mrs. McClellan, Mr. Cline, Ms. Spanberger, Mr. Beyer, Mr. Griffith, Ms. Wexton, and Mr. Connolly) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Lynchburg, Virginia, as the Private First Class Desmond T. Doss VA Clinic.

section.header: Name of Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic, Lynchburg, Virginia
section.text: The Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Lynchburg, Virginia, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Private First Class Desmond T. Doss VA Clinic. Any reference to such clinic in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be considered to be a reference to the Private First Class Desmond T. Doss VA Clinic.
